abstract: Federal regulators said the announcement concluded their investigation into whether Toyota recalled enough vehicles.
snippet: Federal regulators said the announcement concluded their investigation into whether Toyota recalled enough vehicles.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Floor mats and accelerators continue to plague Toyota.

headline.main: Toyota to Recall Over 2 Million Vehicles for Gas Pedal Flaws
headline.print_headline: Toyota to Recall Over 2 Million Vehicles for Gas Pedal Flaws
